title: Why the best time for a flight is early in the morning
content: Replay Video UP NEXT Cavaliers Forward Will Not Be Suspended For Game 1 Ejection Cleveland Cavaliers forward Tristan Thompson has been fined $25,000 for his altercation with Golden State's Draymond Green during the final moments of Game 1 of the NBA Finals, but won't be suspended. Days after being ejected from the game for being issued a Flagrant Foul 2 by referees, the NBA announced that “upon review," Thompson’s foul has now been downgraded to a Flagrant 1. The teams will meet for Game 2 of the NBA Championship this Sunday night in Oakland. Wochit NewsBenedict Cumberbatch Helps Cyclist Being Attacked by Four People in London On Saturday, SF Gate reproted that Benedict Cumberbatch reportedly saved a cyclist who was being attacked by a group of four people in London. According to The Sun, the “Doctor Strange” actor jumped out of his Uber on in central London when he saw a food delivery cyclist for Deliveroo being hit over the head with a bottle. Witnesses say Cumberbatch sprinted to the scene yelling at the muggers. He reportedly dragged the four muggers off the victim, being able to fend them off. Wochit NewsNorth Korea Reportedly Wants Someone to Pay Its Hotel Bill For Summit With U.S. On Saturday CNN reported that US officials are trying to solve the logistical issue of who will pay for North Korean leader Kim Jong Un's housing. A week after abruptly scrapping the summit with Kim, President Donald Trump announced Friday that the historic talks were back on for June 12 in Singapore. The Washington Post reported on Friday that with its economy weakened from tough sanctions, Pyongyang is requiring that another country pay for Kim and his delegation's hotel bill. Wochit News1 Cancel SETTINGS OFFHD HQ SD LOUP NEXT Related: Are Early Morning Flights The Best Flights? (Provided by Wochit News) Not a fan of waking with the birds for an early-morning flight? While it may be a struggle getting out of bed, new research has revealed that early flights are less likely to be delayed than those in the afternoon or evening. According to Travel and Leisure, data from FiveThirtyEight found that leaving before 8am is best for avoiding delays and the peak flight delay time is 6pm. © Provided by AOL Travel UK Young woman flying to France The reason for this is air traffic. Forbes reports that airspace is less likely to be crowded in the morning as all flights from the night before have already landed. You're also less likely to experience turbulence in the morning as most thunderstorms and unstable air happen in the afternoon. What's more, early-morning flights are usually cheaper.   TRENDING ARTICLES Daily Overview Horoscope : December 15 Lucknow boy Jitesh Singh Deo wins Mr India World 2017 Best optical illusions that went viral and stumped the internet 10 countries with exceptionally beautiful women Keep yourself updated.
